lyrics.stanza: Make me a hungry seeker, Your filling to receive. Make mine a longing soul, Lord, Your goodness satisfy me. If I'm not hungry empty within, Your blessing will pass me by. Make me a hungry seeker, Lord, I want Your rich supply.

My eyes be set on You, Lord; Each pleasure and each pain Would make me look at You, Lord, God's riches and grace to gain. If I am full and think I'm rich, Empty, You'll send me away; Continually I'm hungry, Lord. My heart on You will stay.
